short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Website scanner extension provides score for visited websites, helps visitors see legitimacy based on variety of factors

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Website Scanner extension is a free tool that helps you stay safe online by scanning websites you visit and giving them a rating based on their security. The extension uses a variety of factors to determine a website's rating.

When you visit a website and hit the button, the Website Scanner extension will display its rating in the popup window. A green rating indicates that the website is more than likely is safe, amber, you should proceed with caution and do more research, while a red rating indicates that the website is potentially dangerous.

The Website Scanner extension is a great way to protect yourself from fake websites and scam websites that are trying to steal your money. By using the extension, you can be confident that you have another layer of protection to check and give you guidance on wither you need to investigate more.

Here are some of the benefits of using the Website Scanner extension:

•	Stay safe online: The extension helps you to stay safe online by scanning websites you visit and giving them a rating based on various factors.
•	Protect yourself from fraud: The extension can help you to protect yourself from fraud by warning you about websites that are potentially dangerous.
•	Make informed decisions: The extension provides you with information about the websites you visit, so you can make informed decisions about whether or not to trust them.

If you are looking for a way to stay safe online, the Website Scanner extension is a great option. It is free to use and easy to install. So what are you waiting for? 

Install the Website Scanner extension today and start protecting yourself from fake websites and scam websites!
